kill_scouter_1.title: Scouter Hunt
kill_scouter_1.description: Scouters represent a threat. Kill 1 to prove your worth.

kill_scouter_2.title: Scouter Hunter
kill_scouter_2.description: You have proven your worth. Now kill 5 to become a true hunter.

kill_guard_1.title: Broken Patrol
kill_guard_1.description: A Guard patrol is roaming nearby. Take them out.

kill_scouter_3.title: Eyes in the Sky
kill_scouter_3.description: Too many Scouters are watching your movements.

kill_scouter_4.title: Signal Interference
kill_scouter_4.description: Scouter signals are overwhelming the area.

kill_kronos_1.title: Echo of Kronos
kill_kronos_1.description: A fragment of Kronos power has manifested.

kill_guard_3.title: Last Line
kill_guard_3.description: The Guards are making a final stand.

kill_scouter_5.title: Light Show
kill_scouter_5.description: Scouters are swarming. Take down a large group to clear the path.

kill_scouter_6.title: Deep Space Sweeper
kill_scouter_6.description: The outermost rim is infested. Clean them up.

kill_guard_4.title: Fortress Breaker
kill_guard_4.description: Guard formations are shielding sensitive areas.

kill_guard_5.title: Iron Phalanx
kill_guard_5.description: Elite Guard units have taken over the sector.

kill_pyramid_3.title: Fractal Annihilation
kill_pyramid_3.description: Pyramids are multiplying at an alarming rate.

kill_pyramid_4.title: Geometry of War
kill_pyramid_4.description: Master the combat against the advanced Pyramid formations.

kill_kronos_2.title: Wrath of the Giant
kill_kronos_2.description: Another Kronos Warship has entered the fray.

kill_kronos_3.title: Fleet Admiral Slayer
kill_kronos_3.description: Take down the command Kronos units.

kill_operation_1.title: Sector Sweep
kill_operation_1.description: Wipe out a mixed force of hostiles.

kill_operation_2.title: The Great Purge
kill_operation_2.description: A massive cleansing effort is required.

kill_bounty_1.title: Rogue Vanguard
kill_bounty_1.description: A rogue ship is terrorizing the sector. End their reign.

kill_bounty_2.title: Lone Wolf Protocol
kill_bounty_2.description: Internal sensors caught a spy attempt. Trace and eliminate.

kill_bounty_3.title: Orbital Assassin
kill_bounty_3.description: A high-profile target has been spotted near the station.

kill_bounty_4.title: Singularity Saboteur
kill_bounty_4.description: Sabotage units are planting mines. Stop them now.

kill_bounty_5.title: The Last Fugitive
kill_bounty_5.description: One of the most wanted pilots has been cornered.

kill_bounty_6.title: Galactic Outlaw
kill_bounty_6.description: A dangerous outlaw is disrupting trade routes.

kill_bounty_7.title: Void Drifter Hunt
kill_bounty_7.description: A silent drifter is mapping our defenses. Intercept them.

kill_bounty_8.title: Nebula Ghost
kill_bounty_8.description: Strange signals suggest a cloaked threat in the nebula.

kill_bounty_9.title: Star-Seeker Elimination
kill_bounty_9.description: This target has escaped us once. Don't let it happen again.

kill_bounty_10.title: Cosmic Renegade
kill_bounty_10.description: A renegade faction is building a base. Strike first.

kill_bounty_11.title: Gravity Defier
kill_bounty_11.description: Physics-defying units are causing gravity wells. Neutralize.

kill_bounty_12.title: Solar Marauder
kill_bounty_12.description: A solar-powered marauder is leaching energy from the sun.

kill_bounty_13.title: Black Hole Shadow
kill_bounty_13.description: Something is lurking in the shadow of the black hole.

kill_bounty_14.title: Radiant Hunter
kill_bounty_14.description: A radiant vessel is blinding our sensors. Take it down.

kill_bounty_15.title: Pulse Stalker
kill_bounty_15.description: Pulse weapons have been detected on this hostile unit.

kill_bounty_16.title: Zenith Raider
kill_bounty_16.description: A raider from the Zenith system has entered our space.

kill_bounty_17.title: Horizon Breaker
kill_bounty_17.description: A horizon-class ship is attempting to breach the perimeter.

kill_bounty_18.title: Titan Fall
kill_bounty_18.description: A titan-class threat has been confirmed. Engage at will.

kill_bounty_19.title: Eclipse Enforcer
kill_bounty_19.description: The eclipse moon is hiding a dangerous secret.

kill_bounty_20.title: Final Frontier Bounty
kill_bounty_20.description: The final bounty on the list. Prove your legend.

kill_skirmish_1.title: Border Friction
kill_skirmish_1.description: Hostiles are testing our borders. Show them the cost.

kill_skirmish_2.title: Tactical Entrenchment
kill_skirmish_2.description: The enemy is digging in. Break their fortifications.

kill_skirmish_3.title: Rapid Response
kill_skirmish_3.description: Immediate support requested in a high-intensity combat zone.

kill_skirmish_4.title: Asteroid Ambush
kill_skirmish_4.description: A trap has been set in the asteroid belt. Fight your way out.

kill_skirmish_5.title: Strategic Suppression
kill_skirmish_5.description: Suppress the enemy fire and reclaim the sector.

kill_skirmish_6.title: Forward Momentum
kill_skirmish_6.description: Push forward and break the enemy's spirit.

kill_skirmish_7.title: Defensive Wall
kill_skirmish_7.description: The station is under threat. Stand your ground.

kill_skirmish_8.title: Counter-Strike Operation
kill_skirmish_8.description: They hit us first. Now it's our turn to strike back.

kill_skirmish_9.title: Sector Clearance
kill_skirmish_9.description: This sector needs to be completely clear of hostiles.

kill_skirmish_10.title: High-Stakes Engagement
kill_skirmish_10.description: A high-stakes battle is unfolding. Your presence is required.

kill_skirmish_11.title: Iron Resolve
kill_skirmish_11.description: Show them your resolve. Don't back down for a second.

kill_skirmish_12.title: Point Blank Clash
kill_skirmish_12.description: A close-quarters engagement in the inner rim.

kill_skirmish_13.title: Sudden Impact
kill_skirmish_13.description: A sudden impact detected. Investigate and neutralize.

kill_skirmish_14.title: Vanguard Push
kill_skirmish_14.description: Lead the vanguard into the heart of the enemy swarm.

kill_skirmish_15.title: Total Domination
kill_skirmish_15.description: Establish total domination over the designated quadrant.

explore_station.title: The Central Hub
explore_station.description: Navigate to the main Space Station at (0, 0) to register your arrival.

explore_mining.title: Mining Sector
explore_mining.description: The Mining Sector is located at (9000, 4500). Go there and check its status.

explore_nebula.title: Nebula Outpost
explore_nebula.description: An outpost is located at (3000, 5500) within the Purple Nebula.

explore_frontier.title: Frontier Outpost
explore_frontier.description: Explore the Frontier Outpost at (-10000, 3000) in the western quadrant.

explore_blackhole.title: Event Horizon
explore_blackhole.description: Scientific sensors report strange readings from the Event Horizon at (-4000, -6000).

explore_inner_comms_relay.title: Comms Relay
explore_inner_comms_relay.description: A communications relay is drifting at (500, -800).

explore_inner_cargo_wreck.title: Wreckage
explore_inner_cargo_wreck.description: A derelict ship has been spotted at (-1200, 400).

explore_inner_asteroid_base.title: Asteroid Field
explore_inner_asteroid_base.description: A suspicious asteroid at (800, 1500) might hold supplies.

explore_inner_signal_buoy.title: Signal Buoy
explore_inner_signal_buoy.description: A navigational buoy is offline at (-500, -2000).

explore_inner_ancient_pod.title: Escape Pod
explore_inner_ancient_pod.description: An unidentified pod is floating at (2200, -100).

explore_mid_derelict_frigate.title: Derelict Ship
explore_mid_derelict_frigate.description: A decommissioned ship is located at (6000, -2500).

explore_mid_nebula_shrine.title: Shrine
explore_mid_nebula_shrine.description: A mysterious object hidden in the fog at (4000, -4500).

explore_anomaly_singularity_alpha.title: Anomaly Alpha
explore_anomaly_singularity_alpha.description: An energy spike detected at (-10000, 6000). Investigate immediately.

explore_anomaly_singularity_beta.title: Anomaly Beta
explore_anomaly_singularity_beta.description: An energy spike detected at (10000, -6000). Investigate immediately.

explore_anomaly_singularity_omega.title: Anomaly Omega
explore_anomaly_singularity_omega.description: An energy spike detected at (-10000, -6000). Investigate immediately.
